author: ywkao
body:
#### PR description:

This PR depends on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41932.

The DQMStoreStats::calcstats() method handles bin contents of DQM monitor elements by using the GetArray() method, but the newly integrated TH2Poly histogram type lacks this method.

This PR provides a simple workaround by implementing a custom GetTH2PolyArray() function that extracts bin contents from TH2Poly objects and formats them appropriately for the DQM framework.

#### PR validation:

This branch will be rebased and validated after #41932 is merged.
title: Add GetArray support for TH2Poly histograms
